name: Query Generator
desc: Engineered a scalable survey platform with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and node.js, emphasizing intuitive form design for user feedback.Leveraged GCP’s BigQuery for real-time analytics, drawing insights from user interactions within cloud applications on GCP’s Compute and App Engines.

name: Make My Doctor Appointment
desc: Developed a responsive web interface tailored for healthcare appointment management, seamlessly integrating physician availability and optimizing patient scheduling in line with database-driven doctor time slots.
